snippet.title: ASKA | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sign up for our next Closed Beta 15th-21st April NOW via our Discord
🔗 https://discord.gg/eJ4P3nXjC4

Lay claim to unspoiled lands and pave the way for a fierce Viking tribe.
Craft the ultimate settlement solo or together with up to x3 friends.
Trust in the Gods and the power of the Eye of Odin and summon intelligent NPC villagers to provide camaraderie and relief from the toils of survival.
_______________________________________________________________

Published by Thunderful Games
Developed by Sand Sailor Studios

Follow ASKA on social media to stay updated with the latest on the game! 

►Twitter https://twitter.com/ASKAthegame
►TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@askathegame
►Instagram https://www.instagram.com/askathegame
►Facebook https://www.facebook.com/ASKAthegame
_______________________________________________________________
⚡Follow us on Thunderful Games' social media to stay updated on the latest news!⚡

►Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/c/Thunderful

►Twitter - https://twitter.com/Thunderfulgames
►Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/thunderfulgames/
►Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thunderfulgames/
►TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@thunderfulgames
►Discord - https://www.discord.gg/thunderful

Psst... and don't forget to subscribe to our newsletter! ✉️
https://thunderfulgames.com/newsletter/
